mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('', sentence)
    return words[::-1]

import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    return words[::+1]

import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    return words[::-2]

import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    return words[::-0]

import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    return words[::-0]

import re

def reverse_words(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    return words[::--1]
